items.sentence: I don\'t understand how I could\'ve made this mistake.
You sound like you don\'t want to be an archaeologist.
Are there any French magazines in your school library?
Mary put her head on Tom\'s shoulder and began to cry.
How long does it take you to get ready in the morning?
Tom didn\'t even try to get his homework done on time.
Tom can do whatever he likes as far as I\'m concerned.
Tom has climbed mountains in many different countries.
Tom said he couldn\'t remember what needed to be done.
Tom and Mary dipped into their savings to buy a house.
Tom bought a house with a magnificent view of the sea.
Tom bought an expensive Christmas present for himself.
Tom called me almost every day while he was in Boston.
Mary asked her husband to grow a mustache like Tom\'s.
The music coming from next door was loud and annoying.
The nation as a whole is in favor of political reform.
After drinking three bottles of beer, Tom fell asleep.
Tom gave Mary a detailed explanation of how it worked.
Tom got out of prison on October 20th three years ago.
Tom got out of the shower and put his clothes back on.
